LanguageData.RC_CannotOverlapOtherRoofColumns: The Roof Column cannot overlap other Roof Columns.
LanguageData.RC_OverwriteTooltip: If expanding and there's a roof in the way, overwrite the roof with the one from the column (e.g. support making a 'door' in a mountain by overwriting the im). Note: this is a global toggle, there is an option per-column as well.
LanguageData.RC_CannotExpandOverExistingRoofColumn: Can't toggle off partial expansion when there's another roof column in the way at maximum expansion.
LanguageData.RC_InvalidRotation: Can't rotate a roof column into another roof column.
